sources.title: The Case of Charles Peace
sources.description: Title: The Case of Charles Peace Summary: Businessman Charles Peace leads a double life--by day he's a respected local businessman, but by night he's a professional thief who lets nothing, not even murder, stop him from getting what he wants. Directed by: Norman Lee Actors: Michael Martin Harvey, Chili Bouchier, Valentine Dyall Production Company: John Argyle Productions Release Date: March 1949 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Businessman Charles Peace leads a double life--by day he's a respected local businessman, but by night he's a professional thief who lets nothing, not even murder, stop him from getting what he wants.

metadata.Plot: Businessman Charles Peace leads a double life--by day he's a respected local businessman, but by night he's a professional thief who lets nothing, not even murder, stop him from getting what he wants.
